verses.roman:
sabāra caraṇa rūpa karilā vandana
kṛpā kari' rūpe sabe kailā āliṅgana

synonyms: sabāra—of all the devotees; caraṇa—to the lotus feet; rūpa—Śrīla Rūpa Gosvāmī; karilā vandana—offered prayers; kṛpā kari'-showing great mercy; rūpe—Rūpa Gosvāmī; sabe—all the devotees; kailā—did; āliṅgana—embracing.
translation: Śrīla Rūpa Gosvāmī offered his respectful obeisances unto the lotus feet of them all, and all the devotees, by their mercy, embraced him.
